name: Push-Ups
description: Classic bodyweight exercise targeting the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Squats
description: Compound lower body exercise for building leg strength.

name: Plank
description: Isometric core exercise that also engages the shoulders and back.

name: Lunges
description: Unilateral lower body exercise to improve balance and leg strength.

name: Burpees
description: High-intensity exercise involving a combination of a squat, push-up, and jump.

name: Crunches
description: Basic abdominal exercise targeting the rectus abdominis.

name: Mountain-Climbers
description: Dynamic exercise that improves cardiovascular fitness and engages multiple muscle groups.

name: Supermans
description: Back extension exercise to strengthen the lower back muscles.
